abstract.p: Jonathan Mandell is leaving as N W Ayer & Partners chief creative officer; Jack Cardone and Michael Grieco to share post; DDB Digital names Matt Freeman chief executive; names chief operating officer Steven Marrs to added post of president; names John Young chief creative officer; Phase 2 Media names Rick Sirvaitis to new post of president and chief operating officer (M)

block.p: The top creative executive at N. W. Ayer & Partners in New York, part of the B Com3 Group, is leaving. The agency said Jonathan Mandell, 45, worldwide chief creative officer at Ayer for more than a year, would ''pursue new interests.''
Mr. Mandell was succeeded at Ayer by Jack Cardone, 42, and Michael Grieco, 43, as co-chief creative officers; they had each held the title of executive vice president and group creative director.

The top creative executive at N. W. Ayer & Partners in New York, part of the B Com3 Group, is leaving. The agency said Jonathan Mandell, 45, worldwide chief creative officer at Ayer for more than a year, would ''pursue new interests.''
Mr. Mandell was succeeded at Ayer by Jack Cardone, 42, and Michael Grieco, 43, as co-chief creative officers; they had each held the title of executive vice president and group creative director.

DDB Digital in New York, the interactive division of the DDB Worldwide unit of the Omnicom Group, is revamping and naming its three managing partners to new posts. Matt Freeman, 30, co-chief creative officer, was named chief executive. Steven Marrs, 33, chief operating officer, was named to the additional post of president. And John Young, 40, co-chief creative officer, was named chief creative officer.

And at Phase 2 Media in New York, an online advertising and marketing company, Rick Sirvaitis was named to the new post of president and chief operating officer. Mr. Sirvaitis, 50, had been president for advertising sales at Fox Family Worldwide in New York, of which the News Corporation and Saban Entertainment each own half.
